ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Surname
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Windlehands! Tell everyone Sylia is your wife and watch them turn into Teir Dal with envy! Someday, she will drop that professional demenor and let me know
ygData.messageBody:
>I finally made 20th level yesterday. It has been a long hard trip so far. I
>don't see how a lot of you guys move up so fast. I am lucky if I can gain 1
>level per week. Anyway, I was wondering if you have any ideas for a good
>surname. I figured ya'll had probably seen, or thought about it a lot more
>than I have. I was thinking of using Windsong. Suggestions?



Windlehands! Tell everyone Sylia is your wife and watch them turn into
Teir'Dal with envy!

Someday, she will drop that professional demenor and let me know her real
feelings for me...

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
